title: Sightstone ...
body:
is not the only source of wards in the game. Between trinkets and vision wards you can keep good vision without having to buy a sight stone.

Agree? Disagree?

replies.body:
Riot released Warding stats per tier. Speaks volumes to how important vision control really is.

I'd honestly argue that 1 sightstone isn't enough. But thats just me. I love junglers who buy the trackers knife

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/escape-darkness-low-elo-warding-and-you
wow that is an interesting graph. very cool. thanks for that.

Depends on the MMR/ELO you are at honestly.

The higher you go the more you need a sightstone, as more wards get swept, and the lower you go the less people look at the map.
interesting thought. Maybe that is my issue - I've been playing in lower ELO for so long that generous use of trinkets and the odd vision ward is enough.

Honestly in lower elo it's kind of a mixed bag.

For 1, you kinda do need the wards because players tend to be extremely unpredictable in what they do, however for 2, no one uses the map to actually make use of their wards that they have (in bronze, it's almost a waste to smite raptors because even if the enemy has a ward you can still walk in.)
